title: Binary bit patterns
creator_credit: Information International and Motion Graphics, Pyramid Films and Michael Whitney
brief_description: This film puts a musical backing to a kaleidoscope of regular and abstract patterns based on geometric computer forms. Rapid movement of these ever-changing images is created with variations in colour and visual effect. Suitable for secondary years 7-12.
